45.eng-name: The Book of Virtue, Enjoining Good Manners, and Joining of the Ties of Kinship

hadiths.text: This hadith has been transmitted on the authority of Abu Huraira and in the hadith transmitted on the authority of Ibn Hatim Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) is reported to have said:When any one of you fights with his brother, he should avoid his face for Allah created Adam in His own image

chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition Of Striking The Face
